text: Soni nkaliweni lyuŵa ndema jalikopoka (ni kwelelaga nsana) lilinkujiŵambala mbanga jaojo (ni kuŵala kwakwe) chakun’dyo, sano ndema jalikutiŵila (nkaliweni) lilinkwaŵambala (ni kuŵala kwakwe) chakunchiji, kutendaga ŵanganyao ŵaliji pantetete mwalakwemo. Yalakweyo ni ine mu ilosyo ya Allah (yakulosya ukombosi Wakwe). Mundu jwan’jongwele Allah, basi jwalakwe ni jwali jwakongoka, nambo jwannechelele kusokonechela nganim’ba mumpatiile nsyoŵe jwakun’jongola
